attributes.action: Record and publish accurate data for all (non British) EU citizens entering & leaving the UK from January 2014
attributes.additional_details: Successive government statistical data for UK Border access has proven to be wholly inaccurate.  Not only does this present a risk to national security, it also prevents the implementation of a properly managed immigration policy.  The government must immediately take action to ensure that all access through the UK border is properly monitored, accurately recorded and that factual statistical data is easily accessible to the British public, in a clear, concise and transparent manner.
